Message: ...I guess that’s true.

Sol’s so nice,
so she’d probably be happy...
even if she received a gift
as misshapen as this...

Maybe it’d be better
if I leave now to go buy
something from a shop...

“There’s nothing
wrong with failing.”

Suddenly, standing in my room,
was a girl with a big smile
across her face.

Huh, the door’s closed,
so how did she get in...?

The window’s open, I guess,
but this is the second floor...
“What matters most is the heart.

It’s truly beautiful seeing
someone put in so much effort
for someone else, after all.”

B-But...I’ve been working
so hard to make this present,
but it never turns out well...
So...

I stood there,
my eyes staring at the floor,
when she tightly
grasped my hands,
trying to fill me with courage.

“Remember why you’re
working so hard for Sol.”
I’m working so hard...

because Sol always does
everything she can for me,
even though I do
nothing but fail...

That’s why I want to tell her,
“Thank you for everything.”
And, “I love you.”

Yes... I’ve always made
excuses to run away...

But now, at least for Sol,
I want to do my best.

I don’t want to give up
on Sol’s present...!
